data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jung, Sunghoon (2017): Review of the genus Elasmostethus (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Acanthosomatidae) from the Korean Peninsula.
